Documentation on AACR Project GENIE can be found ___________here__________. For the purposes of this vignette, we will be using a subset of the publicly-accessible non-small cell lung cancer version 2.0. See this vignette ___________here__________ from the {genieBPC} package for more information on how to retrieve additional data sets.
